com.sun.jna.platform.linux

Class XAttrUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.jna.platform.linux.XAttrUtil

  • public abstract class XAttrUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility functions class for handling file extended attributes on Linux.
